ygData.subject: Re: Selo's and root
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It may have been changed/fixed.  Someone reposted a reply from GZ I think at the Concert Hall message board, in which he said Verant decided Accel breaking
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 16 Nov 1999, Eric Boller wrote:
>
> Although Selo's does not break root anymore I thought
> we had determined that it would on the next pulse if
> you were playing it before being rooted. Well, last
> night in Mistmoore this did not appear to be the case.

It may have been changed/fixed. Someone reposted a reply from
GZ I think at the Concert Hall message board, in which he said
Verant decided Accel breaking root was too powerful so they
removed it. :-(

> can anyone verify the root thing? I'll try to
> experiment with a rooter tonight.

Why can't I get the roto-rooter song out of my head... :-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
